thread.title: Close encounter: Snooki slams NJ Gov. Chris Christie, says expression 'full of hate'
thread.title_full: Close encounter: Snooki slams NJ Gov. Chris Christie, says expression 'full of hate'

title: Close encounter: Snooki slams NJ Gov. Chris Christie, says expression 'full of hate'
text:
Enlarge Image 
FILE - In this Aug. 25, 2015 file photo, New Jersey Gov. Chris Christie answers a question as he addresses a gathering at the Chabad House at Rutgers University in New Brunswick, N.J. In a book published this week by Nicole "Snooki" Polizzi, a cast member on the MTV reality series "Jersey Shore," she recalls an encounter with Christie, saying his expression was “full of hate” after she introduced herself in 2013 when both were on the boardwalk in Seaside Heights. Their tense encounter was caught on video and recounted in “Strong is the New Sexy,” in a passage titled “The Governor of New Jersey Tried to Eat Me.” Christie has disparaged the reality TV show as bad for the state’s image. Snooki has called him a bully. (AP Photo/Mel Evans) 
NEW YORK, N.Y. - Former "Jersey Shore" star Nicole "Snooki" Polizzi doesn't have happy memories of meeting New Jersey Gov. Chris Christie. 
In a book published this week, Snooki recalls that Christie's expression was "full of hate" after she introduced herself in 2013 when both were on the boardwalk in Seaside Heights. Their tense encounter was caught on video and recounted in Snooki's "Strong is the New Sexy," in a passage titled "The Governor of New Jersey Tried to Eat Me." Joking about the size of Christie, a candidate for the Republican presidential nomination in 2016, she writes that he outweighed her by "a thousand pounds." 
The two have feuded for years. Christie has disparaged the reality TV show as bad for the state's image. Snooki has called him a bully.
